definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: Nature must be gladsome when I was so happy.
sentences.chinese: 当我欣喜万分的时候，大自然也一定非常高兴。

sentences.english: Lobbyists in Washington have been delighted by all this new activity.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿的游说团体对于这些新活动一直欣喜不已。

sentences.english: Jinshan conscious weakness found old adversary, joy in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 金山自觉发现了老对头的软肋，心中欣喜。

sentences.english: Month of pregnancy, bring joy zijun.
sentences.chinese: 子月怀孕，给子君带来欣喜。

sentences.english: It resides in the particular things thathe delighted to record.
sentences.chinese: 它就栖身于塞林格满怀欣喜记录下来的那些事物中。

sentences.english: We are very happy with the results we have achieved in China.
sentences.chinese: 他还说“我们对我们在中国取得的成绩感到欣喜。

sentences.english: I'll sew my bridal dress for next life with delight.
sentences.chinese: 我要在那儿欣喜地缝制，来世出嫁的霓裳。

sentences.english: She had hardly ever been in a state so nearly approaching high spirts in her life.
sentences.chinese: 她有生以来还很少这样接近过欣喜如狂的程度。

sentences.english: It is clearly water overflowing rain, the joy and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 那分明是流水满溢，雨后初晴的欣喜和清新。

sentences.english: As a result, the hearts will be more of comfort and joy.
sentences.chinese: 于是，心中便多了一份慰籍与欣喜。

sentences.english: Zings with joy because you're friends.
sentences.chinese: 欣喜快乐，因为你们是朋友。

sentences.english: Well, aren't you glad now that you get rid of that old tree?
sentences.chinese: 好啦，难道你现在不因为去掉了那棵古树而欣喜吗？

sentences.english: Acutually, Ann will be pleased with any color, even black.
sentences.chinese: 甚至任何颜色都可以使安欣喜。

sentences.english: Girl is delighted, and of course the back to the volunteers with a treasure.

sentences.english: Fans were delighted to see their heroes riding with the hoi polloi .
sentences.chinese: 拥趸们欣喜的看到他们的英雄们在和大家伙一起骑车。
